name: Mix Life
description:
Mix Life

An Online Multiplayer Survival game, you have to survive by any means, create a community, looking for weapons and food, be good or bad

Early Access

You can play MixLife For Free

Current Version : Build 0.3.0Status : in DevelopmentRelease Notes : Click HerePublic Server : OnlineMain Features
  • Big Map
  • Inventory System
  • In Game Chatting
  • Clothes System
  • Player Hunger System
  • Weapon, Food, Medicine etc loot
  • Zombies NPC
  • Indonesian Environment
  • Standalone Public Server
  • Interactive Animation
  • Advance Player Movement System
  • Etc
Developer NotesThis Game is Still in Development, all the Release not representate the final game, be patient and give us feedback to keep this game in Quality
